Articles.Content:
Hi,

it would be great to have a flag inside each part like

reload=false/true

so using "reload all" from debug menu will in fact reload only parts for which the flag is true, just to avoid reloading 1000 parts when only one is modified.

(default value false if flag not there, modders have to remove it/set it to false for release).

Maybe there could be two buttons in fact: "reload all" as it is now, and "reload" which take the flag into account.

(or "reload marked", "reload modded", "reload <something>")

Regards.

The devs should be working on actual gameplay features, not this. (E: in retrospect, this sounds really harsh and I didn't mean to) To address your issue, keep a modding install with only the parts you need; backup all the rest so you can swap them in and out as needed. Just copy the entire KSP directory somewhere else and pare it down.

Edited April 22, 2014 by regex
